About Me

I am Software Engineering Fellow at General Assembly with a background in tire sales/distrubtion, marketing and hospitality. I have an educational background of Mechanical Engineering at NJIT. I am looking to be part of a company, team or start up that has the need and want to do something great. I pivoted my life into this career to challenge myself and be part of something bigger then myself.

Tic Tac Toe

This is an interactive Tic Tac Toe game that allows you to play against a friend to determine who is best! It tracks wins and losses and amount of games played. Enjoy the user interface and fun design.

Futbol Real

This project is a full stack project where I created the backend and front end. This app is a soccer fans dream where he can connect to his/her favorite teams and follow their progress throughout the season.
